name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.qjournal.parallel-read.num-threads
description: Number of threads per JN to be used for tailing edits.

name: dfs.storage.policy.satisfier.max.outstanding.paths
description:
Defines the maximum number of paths to satisfy that can be queued up in the
    Satisfier call queue in a period of time. Default value is 10000.

name: dfs.namenode.snapshot.max.limit
description:
Limits the maximum number of snapshots allowed per snapshottable
    directory.If the configuration is not set, the default limit
    for maximum no of snapshots allowed is 65536.

name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.retry-delay.max.ms
description:
The maximum number of ms the reducer will delay before retrying
  to download map data.

name: mapreduce.shuffle.max.connections
description:
Max allowed connections for the shuffle.  Set to 0 (zero)
               to indicate no limit on the number of connections.

name: dfs.datanode.max.transfer.threads
description:
Specifies the maximum number of threads to use for transferring data
        in and out of the DN.
